anyone have any examples of drawing a line, a semi circle with arrow based off a transforms location? It must be really easy because I'm certainly not grasping it.

The goal is to render lines with arrows or semi circles with arrows to show the direction of movement for infernal robotic parts. That way it would be more of a hint to beginners.

RCS Build Aid does exactly this.

Oh God, considering I just looked at it to figure out how to get the checkerboard mesh for the attachment nodes. Chalk that up to tunnel vision!
